Key:
I had an excellent time. Shido, today was very
fun. I cannot thank you enough.

Um, Maria? What are you saying? Aren't you
coming home with me?

Saying good-bye is also part of a date.
Will you allow me to do so today?

Ah, I think I get it. If we're living together,
you won't experience meeting and parting.

Yes. So today, we shall return separately.
Is this okay?

Sure thing, no problem. See you later, Maria.
It's still bright, but come home before it gets
dark.

Hmph. Shido, you behave like a parent bidding
their child farewell.
Er, ah, right... This is surprisingly tough.

However, Shido, is this not the time where you
say, I'll take you home"?"
Um... I'll take you home, Maria.

No, I am fine here. Our exchange would lose
all meaning otherwise.
Which is it, then?! Okay, I guess so...
See you, Maria.
Yes, Shido. Good-bye.

(As she bid me farewell, Maria walked off.
Maybe I imagined it, but she looked forlorn,
despite us agreeing to meet up at home.)

(Well, if I leave now, we'll practically arrive
concurrently, so I should kill some time.)
What should I do?
That's...

Did she get away? The black-clothed one...
Arusu. I thought I saw her.

Oogh. It's cold. Since I went and chased her,
the sun set and now it's freezing.

(I could buy something warm at the nearest
convenience store.)
Thank you very much!

Steamed buns are the best when it's cold.
...Huh?
Oh, I thought you'd gone back.

Hmph. It is of no importance to you, Shido
Itsuka. Chasing after a woman, won't people
question your hobbies?
That's not my hobby!

Perhaps I should believe you... So, what are
you holding?
This? A steamed bun. You don't know what it is?
I know. There's nothing I don't know.
All right. Here, you can eat it.
...I don't need it.

Just try and eat it. From the looks of it, you've
never eaten one. Here.
What? For something like that...
Well, if you insist, I accept.

No, don't just stare at it. Eat it. It won't be
any good once it's cold.
Hm...
(She might not actually know how to eat it.)
*munch* Mmm, delicious!
(How was that...?)
Terrible overacting.
Shut up! Be quiet and eat it!
Hmph...
It is quite delicious. Warm, and juicy...
Right? Isn't it good?
Th-That's not completely untrue.

(She's concentrating so hard on the bun, but
it's a half-hearted answer. Well, it's delicious,
so I guess it's fine.)
I'm glad.
What? Don't look at me.
It's nothing.

Just say it. You were thinking a stupid thought,
weren't you? It's written all over your face.

I thought that your face resembles Maria's
when you eat something yummy.
You two really are similar... Hey, ah! Hey!

I wasted too much time with you. That will
do for today.
Wait! I want to keep talking!
Sorry. No can do. See you, Shido Itsuka.
...She's strange.
(Both Maria, and that Arusu.)
All right. I'll head home.
